TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationContractAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OperationContractAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OperationContractAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示方法定义一个操作，该操作是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 应用程序中服务协定的一部分。

span.span: Indicates that a method defines an operation that is part of a service contract in a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求消息的 WS-Addressing 操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the WS-Addressing action of the request message.

value.span: 生成 WS-Addressing Action 标头时要使用的操作。

span.span: The action to use in generating the WS-Addressing Action header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制该方法的操作的输入消息。Use the property to control the action of the method's input message. 由于 WCF 使用此操作来调度传入消息和相应的方法，在该协定操作中使用的消息必须具有唯一的操作。Because WCF uses this action to dispatch an incoming message to the appropriate method, messages used within a contract operation must have unique actions. 默认操作值是协定命名空间的组合 (默认值是"http://tempuri.org/")，（接口名称或类名称，如果使用没有显式服务接口） 的协定名称、 操作名称和一个附加字符串 ("Response") 如果消息是一个相关的响应。The default action value is a combination of the contract namespace (the default value is "http://tempuri.org/"), the contract name (interface name or the class name, if no explicit service interface is used), the operation name, and an additional string ("Response") if the message is a correlated response. 您可以使用 属性重写该默认值。You can override this default with the property. 若要指示服务操作可处理该服务接收的所有消息，但又不能定向到服务操作，请指定值“\*”（星号）。To indicate that a service operation handles all messages that the service receives but cannot be directed to a service operation, specify the value "\*" (an asterisk). 这种类型的操作（称为不匹配的消息处理程序）必须具有下列方法签名之一，否则会引发 ：This type of operation, called an unmatched message handler, must have one of following method signatures, or a is thrown: - 该服务操作只能接受一个 对象，并且返回一个 对象。The service operation can take only a object and return a object. - 该服务操作只能接受一个 对象，并且不返回任何内容（即返回 `void`）。The service operation can take only a object and return nothing (that is, return `void`). > [!NOTE] > 服务协定只能有一个 属性设置为“\*”的服务操作。A service contract can have only one service operation with the property set to "\*". 服务类实现的相同侦听 uri 所承载的服务任何的协定组可以具有多个服务操作属性设置为"\*"时属性设置为`false`。Any group of service contracts hosted at the same listenUri that a service class implements can have many service operations with the property set to "\*" when the property is set to `false`. 但是，只有其中一个服务操作可以让属性设置为"\*"和属性设置为 true。However, only one of those service operations can have the property set to "\*" and the property set to true. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 。For more details, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个服务，该服务使用 和 属性显式控制输入和输出（或答复）消息的 SOAP 操作，并使用 属性控制元数据中操作的名称。The following example is a service that uses the and properties to explicitly control the SOAP actions of both the input and output (or reply) messages, and the property to control the name of the operation in metadata. 最后，应用程序还会使用值为“\*”的 指示处理无法识别的消息的方法。Finally, the application also uses an value of "\*" to indicate a method that handles unrecognized messages. [!code-csharp[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/vb/services.vb#1)] 实现该协定的服务发送类似以下示例的消息：A service that implements this contract sends messages that look like the following example: [!code-csharp[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/cs/services.cs#2)]

span.span: The value is .

summary.span: 指示操作是使用服务协定中的 <methodName> 和 <methodName> 方法对异步实现的。

span.span: Indicates that an operation is implemented asynchronously using a <*methodName*> and <*methodName*> method pair in a service contract.

value.span: 如果 < *methodName*>由匹配方法 < *methodName* >方法，可以通过处理基础结构即服务接口; 上的异步方法对作为实现的操作否则为。

span.span: if the <*methodName*>method is matched by an <*methodName*> method and can be treated by the infrastructure as an operation that is implemented as an asynchronous method pair on the service interface; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasProtectionLevel As Boolean
public: property bool HasProtectionLevel { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否必须对此操作的消息进行加密和/或签名。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the messages for this operation must be encrypted, signed, or both.

value.span: 如果 属性设置为除 以外的任何值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is set to a value other than ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性确定此操作的消息是否需要特定的保护级别。Use the property to determine whether a specific protection level is required by the messages of this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsInitiating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示方法是否实现可在服务器上启动会话（如果存在会话）的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method implements an operation that can initiate a session on the server (if such a session exists).

value.span: 如果允许操作启动服务器上的会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is permitted to initiate a session on the server, otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsOneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示操作是否返回答复消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an operation returns a reply message.

value.span: 如果此方法收到请求消息，但未返回任何答复消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this method receives a request message and returns no reply message; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsTerminating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务操作在发送答复消息（如果存在）后，是否会导致服务器关闭会话。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service operation causes the server to close the session after the reply message, if any, is sent.

value.span: 如果该操作会导致服务器关闭会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation causes the server to close the session, otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the operation.
The name of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来重写 <`operation`> WSDL 中的元素名称。Use the property to override the <`operation`> element name in WSDL. 默认的操作名称为实现方法的名称。The default operation name is the name of the implementing method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性声明在元数据中公开的操作名称。The following code example uses the property to declare the name of the operation as exposed in metadata. [!code-csharp[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/vb/services.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The value is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel ProtectionLevel { System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel get(); void set(System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否必须对操作的消息进行加密和/或签名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the messages of an operation must be encrypted, signed, or both.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制是否必须对操作消息进行加密和/或签名。Use the property to control whether the messages of an operation must be encrypted, signed, or both. 除非较窄范围重写此处设置的值，否则此值是为此操作指定的所有消息的默认值。The value set here is the default value for all messages specified for this operation unless a narrower scope overrides this value. 请记住，运行时的保护行为是在下列属性中设置的保护级别值的组合，这一点很重要。It is important to remember that the protection behavior at runtime is the combination of the protection-level values set on the following properties. 这些属性具有层次结构。These properties have a hierarchical structure. 除非已为较窄范围显式设置了某个不同的值，否则设置最外层的值将为所有较窄的范围确定默认设置。Setting the outermost value establishes the default setting for all narrower scopes unless a different value for a narrower scope is explicitly set. 在这种情况下，外层的值将保持所有较窄的范围的默认设置，但特定的设置除外。In this case, the outer value remains the default for all narrower scopes with the exception of that specifically set. 例如，如果将 设置为 ，并且其他较窄范围都没有设置保护级别，则会对操作协定中的所有消息进行加密和签名。For example, if is set to and no other narrower scopes have protection level settings, all messages in an operation contract are encrypted and signed. 但是，如果其中一个操作将 设置为 ，那么只会对此操作的消息进行签名，而对协定中的所有其他消息进行加密和签名。If, however, one of those operations has the set to , then the messages for that operation are signed but all other messages in the contract are encrypted and signed. 有关保护级别及其假设和范围的详细信息，请参阅[了解保护级别](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。For details about protection levels and their assumptions and scopes, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md). 这些值的设置范围是：The scopes at which these values are set are: 上的 属性。The property on . 上的 属性。The property on . 当协定上没有显式指定保护级别并且基础绑定支持安全性时（无论处于传输级别还是处于消息级别），整个协定的有效保护级别将为 。When there is no protection level explicitly specified on the contract and the underlying binding supports security (whether at the transport or message level), the effective protection level for the whole contract is . 如果绑定不支持安全性（如 ），则整个协定的有效 为 。If the binding does not support security (such as ), the effective is for the whole contract. 因此，根据终结点绑定，即使协定指定了 ，客户端也可以要求不同的消息或传输级别安全保护。The result is that depending upon the endpoint binding, clients can require different message or transport level security protection even when the contract specifies .

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ReplyAction { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于该操作答复消息的 SOAP 操作的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the SOAP action for the reply message of the operation.

value.span: 用于答复消息的 SOAP 操作的值。

span.span: The value of the SOAP action for the reply message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除指定答复消息操作标头的特定值以外，还可以指定字符串“\*”（星号）。In addition to specifying a particular value for the action header of the reply message, you can also specify the string "\*" (an asterisk). 在服务中指定星号可指示 WCF 不能添加到消息中，如果你直接对编程消息会十分有用的答复操作。Specifying an asterisk in the service instructs WCF not to add a reply action to the message, which is useful if you are programming against messages directly. 客户端应用程序中指定星号可指示 WCF 不验证答复操作。Specifying an asterisk in a client application instructs WCF not to validate the reply action. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个服务，该服务使用 和 属性显式控制输入和输出（或答复）消息的 SOAP 操作。The following example is a service that uses the and properties to explicitly control the SOAP actions of both the input and output (or reply) messages. 它还使用 属性声明在元数据中公开的操作名称。It also uses the property to declare the name of the operation as exposed in metadata. [!code-csharp[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationContractAttribute_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontractattribute_properties/vb/services.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
